channel.title: GitHub PHP Monthly Trending
channel.description: Monthly Trending of PHP in GitHub

item.title: danielmiessler/SecLists
item.description: SecLists is the security tester's companion. It's a collection of multiple types of lists used during security assessments, collected in one place. List types include usernames, passwords, URLs, sensitive data patterns, fuzzing payloads, web shells, and many more.

item.title: PrestaShop/PrestaShop
item.description: PrestaShop offers a fully scalable open source ecommerce solution.

item.description: An open source eCommerce plugin for WordPress.

item.description: A school management Software

item.description: A server software for Minecraft: Bedrock Edition in PHP

item.title: nextcloud/server
item.description: ☁️ Nextcloud server, a safe home for all your data

item.title: WWBN/AVideo
item.description: Create Your Own Broadcast Network With AVideo Platform Open-Source. OAVP OVP

item.title: Laracommerce/laracom
item.description: Laravel FREE E-Commerce Software

item.title: pterodactyl/panel
item.description: Pterodactyl is the open-source game server management panel built with PHP7, Nodejs, and Go. Designed with security in mind, Pterodactyl runs all game servers in isolated Docker containers while exposing a beautiful and intuitive UI to administrators and users.

item.title: hyperf/hyperf
item.description: 🚀A coroutine framework that focuses on hyperspeed and flexibility. Building microservice or middleware with ease.

item.title: opencart/opencart
item.description: A free shopping cart system. OpenCart is an open source PHP-based online e-commerce solution.

item.title: EasyCorp/EasyAdminBundle
item.description: The new (and simple) admin generator for Symfony applications.

item.title: WordPress/WordPress
item.description: WordPress, Git-ified. Synced via SVN every 15 minutes, including branches and tags! This repository is just a mirror of the WordPress subversion repository. Please do not send pull requests. Submit patches to https://core.trac.wordpress.org/ instead.

item.title: privacy-protection-tools/anti-AD
item.description: anti-AD是目前中文区命中率最高的广告过滤列表，实现了精确的广告屏蔽和隐私保护。现已支持AdGuardHome，dnsmasq， Surge，Pi-Hole，smartdns等网络组件。完全兼容常见的广告过滤工具所支持的各种广告过滤列表格式

item.title: jqhph/dcat-admin
item.description: 🔥 使用很少的代码快速构建一个功能完善的高颜值后台系统，内置丰富的后台常用组件，开箱即用，让开发者告别冗杂的HTML代码。

item.description: A Free and Opensource laravel eCommerce framework built for all to build and scale your business.
